scripts.sitemaps:minify: for file in ./build/browser/*.xml; do [ -e "$file" ] && awk '{gsub(/>\s+</,"><")}1' "$file" | tr -s ' ' | tr -d '\n' | sed 's/> *</></g' > "$file.tmp" && mv "$file.tmp" "$file"; done
scripts.sitemaps: bun run sitemaps:generate && bun run sitemaps:minify
scripts.build: bun run clean:all && bun run build:browser --minify --sourcemap=external && bun run build:server && bun run copy:public && bun run sitemaps && bun run compress
scripts.dev:browser: mkdir -p build/browser && bun run copy:public && bun run sitemaps && bun run build:browser --watch
scripts.dev:start: while [ ! -f ./build/server/index.js ]; do sleep 0.5; done && bun run --watch ./build/server/index.js
scripts.dev: bun run clean:all && (bun run dev:browser & pid_browser=$; bun run dev:server & pid_server=$; bun run dev:start & pid_start=$; wait; kill $pid_browser $pid_server $pid_start)
